name: !verify setup
description: Run setup verification in your server

name: !verify setchannel #newChannel
description: Set verification to specific text channel

name: !verify setrole @role
description: Set a role to be automatically assigned to members once they complete the verification process.

name: !verify takerole @role
description: Remove a role from the list of roles that are automatically assigned to members after verification.

name: !verify refresh
description: Use this command to refresh any deleted roles in verification
